list_definition.definition: to attempt or make an effort (to do, get etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He tried to answer the questions
Let’s try and climb that tree!

list_definition.definition: to test; to make an experiment (with) in order to find out whether something will be successful, satisfactory etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She tried washing her hair with a new shampoo

list_definition.definition: to judge (someone or their case) in a court of law

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The prisoners were tried for murder.

list_definition.definition: to test the limits of; to strain

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Have a try (at the exam). I’m sure you will pass.

list_definition.mean_english: điểm trong môn bóng bầu dục
list_definition.definition: in rugby football, an act of putting the ball on the ground behind the opponents’ goal-line

list_ex_of_english: He understood the art of music and tried to practice it.
